website_summaries.verdict: This is a decent introductory Calphalon cookware set, especially for those who want affordable nonstick. Individual pieces may not be ideal, however. Read the product description carefully before ordering.
pros: Heavy glass lids allow for observation during cooking
Heavy construction, oven safe to 500 degrees
cons: Set may not contain the best sizes for specific needs
Durability and appearance are common concerns
Nonstick coating easily scratched with metal utensils

customer_reviews.title: I know better, to buy one and test it first.
customer_reviews.text: I've owned this set for about two years, I hand wash all of my pans with a soft sponge, after four months things started to stick on the frying pans, I will not recommend this product, the price does not justify the product, I just purchased a $19.99 Copper Chef pan, and I'm loving it, I ordered two more on AMAZON this was the best pan I've ever cooked with.
customer_reviews.author: Betty Audish Exotic Handbags

customer_reviews.title: Wife loves birthday gift
customer_reviews.text: My wife is Really happy with the cookware. After 40 years of marriage she was actually surprised by my birthday gift to her. The nonstick cookware has made cooking and cleanup much easier for us. It has exceeded our expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Wil V.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: True to Calphalon's quality this set is super! The sizes are great.
customer_reviews.author: Bc

customer_reviews.title: These pans are awesome and i love them
customer_reviews.text: These pans are awesome and i love them, one small hiccup with the order though is that Instead of a 10'' and 8'' omley pan I got a package with a 10'' and a 12'' which isn't a terribly big deal since the number of pans stays the same but it does kind of bug me that i now need to buy a pan I was thinking I was getting separately
customer_reviews.author: Chris McKeeman

customer_reviews.title: Amazon was amazing with the exchange
customer_reviews.text: We had to return our first set we had bought from another seller and received a set from this seller. Amazon was amazing with the exchange! The second set we received was great. We love it!!! They work great for cooking and are not hard to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Lankford

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Love these pans. Bought my children sets for wedding gifts and finally decided it was time I had a set. Love, love, love them!!
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: These definitely are the best pots I have ever bought
customer_reviews.text: These definitely are the best pots I have ever bought. I have had them for about 4 months now and they perform beautiful. Let's see what their longevity is!
customer_reviews.author: Dan Huwyler

customer_reviews.title: The very best cookware I've ever used
customer_reviews.text: The very best cookware I've ever used !! Easy to clean and exceptional quality - no sticking - worth every penny
customer_reviews.author: sharon seagle

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean.
customer_reviews.text: I love this cookware. It so easy to clean. The sear coating seems to make a difference in well searing, albeit slightly harder to clean very easy to clean cookware.
customer_reviews.author: FastDime

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: These are really good, durable, and stylistic pots & pans with a consistent cooking surfaces. I would recommend these products.
customer_reviews.author: HG

customer_reviews.title: Love Them!
customer_reviews.text: Best pans I have ever owned! We always follow all care instructions for Nonstick pans. In spite of that, in a year or two the Teflon starts to peel. I have been waiting for a set that was dishwasher safe. Not because I want to wash them in a dishwasher but because I knew if they had advanced enough to withstand it, with normal use and hand washing they should be my last set of pans. Absolutely, nothing sticks! Do pay attention that they need to be thoroughly oiled the first time you use them to season. I just used my fingers and rubbed on a light coating of olive oil.
customer_reviews.author: L. B.

customer_reviews.title: Steer clear
customer_reviews.text: I've had this set since August 2015 and seriously they look 5+ years old. I only use the caplalon utensils but the pans are a rated on the inside and outside. We have a gas cooktop. Very disappointed and so not worth the $400 I paid for them.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best pans on the market in my opinion. These replaced my 13 year old Calphalon Professional Non Stick series.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: This is the most professional set you'll ever get or ever need.
customer_reviews.text: FANTASTIC pans. Seriously non-stick. And if you register them with Calphalon, you have a lifetime guarantee that they really stick to. I had one frying pan previously. It did peel just a little, they replaced it with no questions. They're heavy and you need to protect the other pans from the edges of pans you might stick inside each other, but these will last you a long time. LOVE the deep wall fryer for meat + sauce or fried rice dishes. I do wish they had a wider stock pot with this set as well, but we'll add that a la carte next Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: KPKoze

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love these pots and pans. I now have no excuses for burning anything
customer_reviews.author: JO

customer_reviews.title: you know the importance of good tools. These pans don't disappoint and will last ...
customer_reviews.text: Worth the price. If you are serious about your cooking, you know the importance of good tools. These pans don't disappoint and will last a long time if you take care of them.
customer_reviews.author: Harvey Mestas

customer_reviews.title: Excellent set, amazing nonstick and bought at an excellent ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent set, amazing nonstick and bought at an excellent price point. I had the older model of this set and lasted me more than 10 years. Highly recommended to every cooks at home.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The rest of the set is great!
customer_reviews.text: One of my frying pans is pealing already, only used it twice. The rest of the set is great!
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: by far the best cookware we have ever owned
customer_reviews.text: by far the best cookware we have ever owned. we don't put them in the dishwasher because they are so easy to clean by hand.
customer_reviews.author: steve

customer_reviews.title: after using them for several years they look like they are five hundred years old
customer_reviews.text: These pans are nonstick, even after years of use. However, after using them for several years they look like they are five hundred years old. I've used the proper materials for cooking and cleaning, but they are so scratched up that I plan to replace them. Plus the handles get so hot they are dangerous.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia L. Simmons

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: We've always watched the price when we bought cookware - and the cookware has never been great. We decided to replace the budget set of pots & pans with the good stuff. Glad we did it. It's so much easier to control cooking temperatures with with a high quality heavy duty aluminum set of cookware. And, the nonstick is great. FWIW, the Sear & Slide surfaces perform as advertised. Looking forward to many years of service from this set.
customer_reviews.author: The Traveler

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I gave these set to my daughter and her husband for a wedding present. She loves them very much.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Birgensmith

customer_reviews.title: Calphalon Unison pan set
customer_reviews.text: The pans are awesome. No tephlon to scrape, takes awhile for pan to heat up then you have to turn the heat back down. Cooks a very tender chicken breast unlike tephlon made it dry & chewy. There is a difference! Love 'em!
customer_reviews.author: Namelreg

customer_reviews.title: Calphalon Unison Cookware
customer_reviews.text: I had a previous Calphalon set for 15 years but it was time to upgrade. I shopped in local department stores & online. I couldn't believe the price I got online...saved 100's of dollars! My wife was a great cook with the old stuff but now is a greater cook. She loves this cookware & loves me more for buying it!
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: Love this set!
customer_reviews.text: It is a shame this line is being discontinued! This is a great set and one of the few of this quality that is dishwasher safe. The nonstick coating works very well so far. I only wish that the skillets came with lids.
customer_reviews.author: J. Gerth

customer_reviews.title: So sad...
customer_reviews.text: While I love the look and even heating, I'm disappointed with the quality for such a well-known and pricey brand. I use plastic calphalon brand utensils. While stirring food in your pots and pans or scraping out the last spoonfuls of food into a serving dish- the utensils scratch the coating. So if you plan to cook, buy all rubber cooking utensils. I'm so sad about my pots.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: best yet!
customer_reviews.text: I love my new set! so easy to clean and cook with! love the light weight but still good quality pots and pans
customer_reviews.author: Megan Wernecke

customer_reviews.title: Love our Calphalon cookware
customer_reviews.text: Last set of Calphalon's lasted about 15 years, purchased this set to replace them. Love our Calphalon cookware, and these are dishwasher safe! :)
customer_reviews.author: nataliedvm

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift and value for the money in my opinion
customer_reviews.text: Bought these as a gift for my wife. She loves Calphalon cookware! A little on the heavy side as far as the skillet and frying pans but the quality of the metal and product is the reason they are heavy in weight. Perfect gift and value for the money in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Joey Ezell

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this set! Excellent weight - not too heavy, but still substantial! Cleans up beautifully! Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent set of pots and pans. Replacing gear after 20+ years and my how pots and pans have changed. Very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Jay P. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not exactly what i expected. The large pot has weird design, hard to cook in.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The Best Cookware EVER!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried many different non stick cookware over the years, but this is the 1st time I have ever tried Calphanlon...I will not try anything else! Its better than terrific!
customer_reviews.author: Lou Lou

customer_reviews.title: excellent!
customer_reviews.text: After years of low-budget pots and pans, I finally purchased the Calphalon Unison 10-piece set. They are excellent quality - no stick, easy to clean, very little oil needed to cook with - I love them!
customer_reviews.author: C. Marshall

customer_reviews.title: So this is what non stick means.
customer_reviews.text: The first time I used these I was blown away. The egg was sliding around like my butt used to do with soap in a wet bathtub as a kid. (You know you did that. It was like a cool slide). Since then I've cooked everything and not once have I had an issue with sticking. Hand washing is a breze but you can throw it in the dishwasher as well. Overall very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: DT

customer_reviews.title: Will get destroyed in dishwasher
customer_reviews.text: Just look at the pictures... I hope you find this helpful. My pots and pans broke down over the course of 12-18 months. Calphalon was good about warranty replacing each item I would send them, but that is at my USPS expense and is a pain. I wish the cookware wouldn't break down in the first place. I noticed that cookware in the dishwasher decays very quickly. I've been hand washing the pots and pans since then. They still break down a bit, but nothing like before in the dishwasher. Just as an additional data point, these were used on an electric coil stove.
customer_reviews.author: LGS

customer_reviews.title: Calphalon delivers again.
customer_reviews.text: WOW, love this cookware. Had to get some new utensils to use in them but I love them. MIne arived with the small pot with a defect so I am waiting for a return to complete the transaction. They said it would be late February so I am patiently waiting.Lets see how the customer service works and I Will be back to add that final star. These are heavy so beware. I already had the two piece omelet pan set so I put the new pans aside for the future.
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Cheap made and the coating is flaking off 4-quart Saute Pan and 8-inch Omelette Pan was One year later and the most used pan have lost much of the finish or are stained badly Do not buy this products
customer_reviews.author: AR

customer_reviews.title: So slick the food slides around
customer_reviews.text: I love these, nothing sticks to them. Very easy to clean and the food cooks up great.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Coating is iffy
customer_reviews.text: Decent but the coating hasn't held up as well as I'd hoped. It's disappointing since they're so pricey!
customer_reviews.author: Madonna

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful cookware with a quality feel and works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: The cookware was as advertised and arrived quickly. It comes with a set of instructions with many caveats that can result in a voided warranty if not followed. After following the instructions with each use, I'm very pleased with the purchase. Delivery was quick and without incident.
customer_reviews.author: rsk

customer_reviews.title: Cookware's great, but the price is fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: Decided to buy a set of the new Calphalon Unison cookware. Everbody had the same price. Then, I found this set and bought it instantly. Was nervous because the price was so low, but it arrived well packaged and all original. Amazing. I'm having a ball using it. They really know how to make great cookware, and this set is a great starting point.
customer_reviews.author: computerguru

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best quality cookware I've ever purchased. Lifetime warranty. Cooking and cleanup a breeze.
customer_reviews.author: 'Bama ersatz plumber

customer_reviews.title: Love these pots and pans - the nonstick surface is ...
customer_reviews.text: Love these pots and pans - the nonstick surface is awesome. We actually melted cheese right in the pan and it slides right out. Don't use Pam on it - it ruins the nonstick surface.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: I love this series
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set after purchasing the Unison wok as a stand alone item. I love this series!
customer_reviews.author: Dana

customer_reviews.title: Professional quality cookware
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding Quality at a great price Professional quality cookware. I've added other pieces to the set.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Deal

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE LOVE LOVE this cookware set! I had been holding out to purchase this set until we moved into a house, and I made it somehow! These cook so evenly and are a breeze to clean up!
customer_reviews.author: bmiller

customer_reviews.title: and just all around great design. BUY THIS COOKWARE
customer_reviews.text: Can't go wrong with Calphalon for reliability, durability, and just all around great design. BUY THIS COOKWARE!
customer_reviews.author: AOW1

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy cooking with this cookware....very easy to clean, sturdy...nice to look at
customer_reviews.author: Linda Gentles

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!!!
customer_reviews.text: Got these as a gift and she absolutely loves them!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Chalom Pittman

customer_reviews.title: Calphalon Unison Nonstick
customer_reviews.text: Love this cookware set. Had a set previously and wore them out. Went to cast iron for a change and althought they were great, they were way too heavy. Love Calphalon!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Warner

customer_reviews.title: They love them because they cook well
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my son and his wife who have been through a few sets of pots.They love them because they cook well, are really non-stick and cleanup is easy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love my new pans
customer_reviews.text: Received as a gift. Replaced 7yr old store bought pans. They are heavy duty. Easy to clean. The short side handle does get warm on the pot but still love them.
customer_reviews.author: Jason C Garner

customer_reviews.title: RUN!
customer_reviews.text: Run! Do not buy this cookware. It is cheaply made and won't last. We bought the whole set plus some additional pieces as a treat for ourselves last year. One year later and the most used pan have lost much of the finish or are stained badly. The skillets with the teflon have deteriorated to the point that I have to use oil to keep food from sticking. My ten year old Faberware skillets looked better when I replaced them. I had one pan that I dropped when taking it out of the cabinet. It fell about a foot to the floor. That pan is now dented and the lid wont fit. Big waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Zipperleg

product_meta.title: Calphalon Unison Nonstick 10-Piece Cookware Set
product_meta.description: Size:10-PieceAt last, nonstick cookware that lets you cook like a professional. Two surfaces make the difference. Unison cookware is built with 2 different nonstick surfaces for different cooking tasks, so you can use healthy, easy-to-clean nonstick to cook with professional precision. Ultra-smooth Slide pans release foods effortlessly for tender omelettes and delicate sauces. Specially-textured Sear pans seal in flavor and provide perfect browning of meats, fish, and vegetables. Clear tempered-glass lids let you see food while it's cooking and are oven safe, so you can finish covered dishes in the oven or keep them warm until ready to serve Includes 8-inch and 10-inch Omelette Pans, 2-quart and 3-quart Sauce Pans with Covers, 4-quart Saute Pan with Cover, and 8-quart Stock Pot with Cover. Long, quadruple-riveted stainless steel handles stay cool on the stovetop. All cookware is dishwasher-safe and carries Calphalon's full lifetime warranty. Includes 8-inch and 10-inch Omelette Pans, 2-quart and 3-quart Sauce Pans with Covers, 4-quart Saute Pan with Cover, and 8-quart Stock Pot with Cover.
feature_bullets: Unison cookware is built with 2 different nonstick surfaces for different cooking tasks, so you can use healthy, easy-to-clean nonstick to cook with professional precision.
Ultra-smooth Slide pans release foods effortlessly for tender omelettes and delicate sauces. Specially-textured Sear pans seal in flavor and provide perfect browning of meats, fish, and vegetables.
Clear tempered-glass lids let you see food while it's cooking and are oven safe, so you can finish covered dishes in the oven or keep them warm until ready to serve

Includes 8-inch and 10-inch Omelette Pans, 2-quart and 3-quart Sauce Pans with Covers, 4-quart Saute Pan with Cover, and 8-quart Stock Pot with Cover. Do not use detergents that contain bleach or citrus additives. Dry your Calphalon Unison Nonstick cookware before storing
Long, quadruple-riveted stainless steel handles stay cool on the stovetop. All cookware is dishwasher-safe and carries Calphalon's full lifetime warranty.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.8 out of 5 stars131 ratings3.8 out of 5 stars
